strings.Value: "How do you know they're from the Technic League?"
"What are you planning?"
"All right. Let's go find out what the Technic League's doing here."
"I have trouble enough without any Numerian wizards. Guards! Get down to the tavern and throw this spy out of the city."
"If they return, the guards will just throw them out again. Leave the past in the past — we have more urgent problems."
{n}Octavia and Regongar exchange a look and both start talking at the same time.{/n}
"Do you think..."
"We knew the {g|Technic League}Technic League{/g} wouldn't just let us go!"
"And they sent their agent right here to the capital! Now that's impudence!"

"He's sitting in a tavern, paying with {g|Numeria}Numerian{/g} gold, and asking around about Reg and me all day. Even if he's not spying for the {g|Technic League}Technic League{/g}, we sure have a few questions for him!"

"It's Kalannah — the wretch you {d|OctReg Kalannah Alive}let go{/d} after you saved us from her! She's sitting in the tavern drinking beer like nothing ever happened! Does she think no one will recognize her?"
"Or maybe she expects someone to. Either way, we have to talk to her."
"What do you think? Once you get someone outside, it's not that hard to beat some information out of them..."
"Reg, that can wait. I'd like to start with a chat, try to find out what exactly they have planned. They wouldn't just send one agent in. And wherever the cronies are hidden..."
"That's where we'll find the big fish!" {n}Regongar slams his fist into his palm with a grin.{/n}
"Wait, don't you understand? They came here for a reason — for us! And that means..." {n}Regongar clenches his fists.{/n} "Maestro Janush must be here, too! This is our chance for revenge!"

"Regongar's right — they're here for us. Even if we were to suddenly forgive Janush and forget about revenge, the {g|Technic League}Technic League{/g} won't ever leave us be. They'll keep coming, again and again, attacking us and those we care about. Let's just deal with them once and for all!"
"Great!"
"We'll wait for you in the tavern."
{n}Regongar stares angrily for a long moment before turning and storming out of the room.{/n}
"You may be right... but I'm afraid it's not so easy to let go of a past like ours. And it definitely won't let go of us..."
